messages.content: what team won the nba finals in 2018? and what do I get if they give me that number in dollars but I have to give half of that money to my brother?
In the 2018 NBA Finals, the Golden State Warriors defeated the Cleveland Cavaliers to win the title. If you receive $1000 and have to give half of that money to your brother, you would receive $500.
when was the last year the Bulls won the Nba championship? And how much money would I have if I win a dollar for each year but I have to share the price with my brother?
The Chicago Bulls won the NBA championship in the 1996-1997 season. If you win a dollar for each year but have to share the prize with your brother, you would have to give your brother $1000.
I mean a dollar for each year, the year being the last year in which the bulls won the ring
The last year the Chicago Bulls won the NBA championship was in the 1995-1996 season. If you win a dollar for each year, you would have to give your brother $1000.
